name: Glider Rider (itch)
description:
A Island Town Glider Rider try to get supplies from balloons. You have to get supplies as many as possible before you run our your fuel.

Recommended Requirements:

PC: Nvidia MX350 or higher

8GB Ram and above

Android: Qualcomm Snapdragon 855 or higher

6GB Ram and above

P.S: For mobile user you can just run game on WebGL since I optimized resolution. Remember turn on mobile option before start the game:)
